member.name: P:NL.Rijksoverheid.ExposureNotification.BackEnd.Components.AppConfig.AppConfigArgs.Version
member.summary: The minimum version of the app.The app has a hardcoded version number that is increased by 1 on each app release. Whenever the app downloads the manifest, it must compare its hardcoded version number with that of the manifest. If the hardcoded version number is less than the manifest value, the user will be asked to upgrade the app from the app store.See https://github.com/minvws/nl-covid19-notification-app-coordination/blob/master/architecture/Solution%20Architecture.md#lifecycle-management.

members.member: This defines the frequency of retrieving the manifest, in minutes.

member.name: P:NL.Rijksoverheid.ExposureNotification.BackEnd.Components.AppConfig.AppConfigArgs.DecoyProbability
member.summary: This defines the probability of sending decoys. This is configurable so we can tune the probability to server load if necessary.
